marklogic.body:
You can Always count on the NYT to run some not-so detailed article to bury the Burning issue. In this case, it is the unconstitutional mandate ordering free citizens, ostensibly living under a set of laws guaranteeing freedom from government tyranny, to one that confuses saving political face in favor of further indentured servitude.
If the federal government can force you to do business with a privately owned corporation or industry, predicated on citizenship, individual rights will become as quaint as voting on paper ballots.
